data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: As saturation decreases, it produces tones of the reference hue that converge on a shade of gray that is determined by the lightness. This ____ the ____ intensity ____ constant. The ____ examples ____ the ____ red, orange, and ____ at ____ lightness ____ decreasing ____. The resulting RGB value and the total intensity is shown.
data.partBlankContent: As saturation decreases, it produces tones of the reference hue that converge on a shade of gray that is determined by the lightness. This ke___ the to___ intensity relat_____ constant. The foll_____ examples us__ the hu__ red, orange, and yel___ at midp____ lightness wi__ decreasing satur_____. The resulting RGB value and the total intensity is shown.
data.answer: 随着饱和度的降低，它会产生参考色调的色调，汇聚到由亮度决定的灰色阴影上。这使得音调强度相对稳定。下面的例子使用了中点亮度的红色、橙色和黄色，饱和度逐渐降低。结果RGB值和总强度被显示。
